api.name: ObIconService
api.usage: This service automatically registers icon sets to be used with the mat-icon component. It is called by the forRoot of the ObIconModule module.

methods.name: registerOnAppInit
methods.text: Called on app initialization, it registers and inlines the defined icon sets.

methods.name: registerIconSetsAsync
methods.text: Called on run time, it requests and registers the given icon sets.

methods.name: registerIconsAsync
methods.text: Called on run time, it requests and registers the given icons.

methods.name: registerIconSets
methods.text: Called on run time, it registers the given serialized icon sets.

methods.name: registerIcons
methods.text: Called on run time, it registers the given serialized icons.

tokens.name: ObUseObliqueIcons
tokens.text: Indicates if Oblique should be rendered with its own icons or with FontAwesome ones.

variables.name: registerObliqueIcons
variables.text: Defines if Oblique's icons have to be registered.

variables.name: additionalIcons
variables.text: Additional icon sets, in string format, to register.

variables.name: fontClass
variables.text: Defines the default class that is applied to the mat-icon component with fontIcon input.
